summary: In this context, buta-1,3-diene is identified as a key intermediate in the production of various industrial chemicals, with its primary application being in the manufacturing of styrene-butadiene rubber (SBR), a type of synthetic rubber. The relationship is significant as buta-1,3-diene is essential for the synthesis of SBR, highlighting its role in the rubber industry and its environmental impact due to emissions during production processes.
